articles.description: Xiaomi has seeded a new Beta Stable update for the Redmi Note 9 Pro, this time in Europe. V12.0.1.0.QJZEUXM will be available as an OTA for the device and brings all variants of the Redmi Note 9 Pro onto MIUI 12. The global MIUI 12 upgrade for all Redmi Note …
articles.content: Xiaomi is seemingly keeping to its promise of finishing the MIUI 12 rollout for the Redmi Note 9 Pro (joyeuse) by the end of the month. The company already finalised V12.0.1.0.QJZMIXM for the global … [+1300 chars]
